#include<iostream> 
#include<algorithm> 
using namespace std;
 
bool predicate(int ar[],int mid,int n,int c)
{
 	int x=ar[0],count=0;
   
 	for(int i=1;i<n;i++) {
	 
		 if(ar[i]-x >=mid ) {
	 		 x=ar[i];
     	 	count++; 
    	 }
  	 }
     if(count >= c - 1) {
     	return true;
     } else {
        return false;
  	 }
}
              
              
int main()
{   
    int n, c, mid;
    
    cin >> n >> c; 
    
	int ar[n]; 
    for(int i= 0;i< n; i++) {
    	cin >> ar[i];
    }
    
	sort(ar,ar+n);
    
	int low = 1;
    int high = ar[n-1]-ar[0];
    int ans = 0;
    
    while(high >= low) {
	    mid = (low + high) / 2;
         
        bool l= predicate(ar,mid,n,c); 
                   
        if(!l) { 
			high=mid-1; 
	    } else{
			ans=mid;
         	low=mid+1;
	 	}
   }
                           
       cout<<ans<<endl;
       return 0; 
}
